examples: he was quick to point out his wife's failings

definitions.text: powerlessness revealed by an inability to act
examples: in spite of their weakness the group remains active

definitions.text: the property of lacking physical or mental strength; liability to failure under pressure or stress or strain
examples: his weakness increased as he became older
the weakness of the span was overlooked until it collapsed

definitions.text: the condition of being financially weak
examples: the weakness of the dollar against the yen

definitions.text: a penchant for something even though it might not be good for you
examples: he has a weakness for chocolate
